Privacy Policy

Last updated: August 23, 2025

Welcome to My Application. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use our e-learning application.

Information We Collect

We collect several types of information from and about users of our application, including:

  • Personal information (name, email address, phone number) that you provide when registering or creating an account.
  • Education information such as your learning progress, course completions, and quiz results.
  • Payment information when you make purchases within the application.
  • Device information including your device type, operating system, and application version.
  • Log data such as your search queries, page views, and interaction with the app features.

How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to:

  • Provide, maintain, and improve our services to you.
  • Process your transactions and send related information including confirmations and receipts.
  • Personalize your learning experience and recommend courses based on your interests and progress.
  • Send you notifications about new courses, updates, or features.
  • Analyze usage patterns to enhance and optimize our application.

Data Security

We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no internet-based service can guarantee absolute security.

Your Rights

You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time through your account settings or by contacting us directly.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@myapplication.com
